lines.text: The Pink Network is on the air. From station KSEX, it's TV as you've never seen it before. Tonight, starring Penthouse Pet Christy Canyon, Ron Jeremy, John Holmes, Harry Reems as Scorpio, and featuring Tamara Longley and Dallas Miko, Mark Wallice, and introducing Ali Moore. W.P.I.N.K., It's Red Hot!!
Well, who do you think you are anyway? Steven Shpielsberg?
That's pronounced Spielsberg...Spielberg. And, no I'm not. Who do you think you are? Gypsy Rose Lee?
"Secret Sperm", "Lays of Our Lives", or "Ball My Children", please.
